ygData.subject: Re: Fletching
ygData.msgSnippet: Checked this out. You mean the group of three....one sells blacksmithing molds, one sells nothing and the other sells fletching materials but only 1/4 of what
ygData.messageBody:
Checked this out. You mean the group of three....one sells blacksmithing
molds, one sells nothing and the other sells fletching materials but only
1/4 of what you need to make an arrow?
The way I see it, SK can never become fletchers without making mule
characters. Which it seems will be the way I will do it I guess.




> There is a group of three ogres in Feerot Forest (near the Ivory bridge).
> One of the females sells all the standard fletching materials.
>
> Hope this helps.
>
> Anthony Mason
> Angor of Clan Amok
> Troll Shadowknight
> Errolosi Marr
